1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Shared and side terms.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Rel.ShareSide
6  ( ShareSide (..),
7    ShareSideMap,
8    ShareSideMap2,
9    shareSide, shareSideOrd,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax              as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Judge     as D
15
16type ShareSideMap c = ShareSide c -> [c] -> [c]
17type ShareSideMap2 a b = (ShareSideMap a, ShareSideMap b)
18
19-- | Shared and side terms.
20data ShareSide c = ShareSide
21    { ssLShareIndex  :: [Int]         -- ^ Indicies of right-shared part
22    , ssRShareIndex  :: [Int]         -- ^ Indicies of left-shared part
23    , ssDisjoint     :: Bool          -- ^ Whether shared part is empty
24
25    , ssLSideNames   :: [S.TermName]  -- ^ Left-side term names
26    , ssLShareNames  :: [S.TermName]  -- ^ Left-shared term names
27    , ssRShareNames  :: [S.TermName]  -- ^ Right-shared term names
28    , ssRSideNames   :: [S.TermName]  -- ^ Right-side term names
29
30    , ssLSide        :: [c] -> [c]    -- ^ Pick left-side part from left contents
31    , ssLShare       :: [c] -> [c]    -- ^ Pick left-shared part from left contents
32    , ssRShare       :: [c] -> [c]    -- ^ Pick right-shared part from right contents
33    , ssRSide        :: [c] -> [c]    -- ^ Pick right-side part from right contents
34
35    , ssRSplit       :: [c] -> ([c], [c])  -- ^ Pick right-shared and right-side part
36    , ssRAssoc       :: [c] -> ([c], [c])  -- ^ Pick right-shared part and right contents
37
38    , ssRForward     :: [c] -> [c]
39    , ssRBackward    :: [c] -> [c]
40    }
41
42-- | Create share-side structure from left and right term names.
43--
44--     >>> let ss = shareSide ["a", "b", "c"] ["b", "c", "d", "e"]
45--
46--     >>> ssDisjoint ss
47--     False
48--
49--   Left terms.
50--
51--     >>> ssLShareIndex ss
52--     [1, 2]
53--
54--     >>> ssLShareNames ss
55--     ["b", "c"]
56--
57--     >>> ssLSide ss "ABC"
58--     "A"
59--
60--     >>> ssLShare ss "ABC"
61--     "BC"
62--
63--   Right terms.
64--
65--     >>> ssRShareIndex ss
66--     [0, 1]
67--
68--     >>> ssRShareNames ss
69--     ["b", "c"]
70--
71--     >>> ssRSideNames ss
72--     ["d", "e"]
73--
74--     >>> ssRShare ss "BCDE"
75--     "BC"
76--
77--     >>> ssRSide ss "BCDE"
78--     "DE"
79--
80--     >>> ssRSplit ss "BCDE"
81--     ("BC", "DE")
82--
83--     >>> ssRAssoc ss "BCDE"
84--     ("BC", "BCDE")
85--
86--     >>> ssRForward ss "BCDE"
87--     "BCDE"
88--
89--     >>> ssRBackward ss "BCDE"
90--     "DEBC"
91
92shareSide :: (D.GetTermNames l, D.GetTermNames r) => l -> r -> ShareSide c
93shareSide left right = shareSideBody li ri left' right' where
94    (li, ri)  = sharedIndex left' right'
95    left'     = D.getTermNames left
96    right'    = D.getTermNames right
97
98-- sharedIndex "dxcy" "abcd"
99-- >>> ([0,2], [3,2])
100--       d c    d c
101sharedIndex :: (Ord a) => [a] -> [a] -> ([Int], [Int])
102sharedIndex xs1 xs2 = (ind1, ind2) where
103    ind1  = B.snipIndex sh xs1
104    ind2  = B.snipIndex sh xs2
105    sh    = B.intersectionFilter xs2 xs1
106
107shareSideOrd :: (D.GetTermNames l, D.GetTermNames r) => l -> r -> ShareSide c
108shareSideOrd left right = shareSideBody li ri left' right' where
109    (li, ri)  = (ind2 left', ind2 right')
110    ind       = B.snipIndex left' right'
111    ind2      = B.snipIndex $ B.snipFrom ind right'
112    left'     = D.getTermNames left
113    right'    = D.getTermNames right
114
115shareSideBody :: [Int] -> [Int] -> [S.TermName] -> [S.TermName] -> ShareSide a
116shareSideBody li ri left right = ss where
117    lside      = B.snipOff  li
118    lshare     = B.snipFrom li
119    rshare     = B.snipFrom ri
120    rside      = B.snipOff  ri
121    rfor       = B.snipForward  ri
122    rback      = B.snipBackward ri
123    rsplit xs  = (rshare xs, rside xs)
124    rassoc xs  = (rshare xs, xs)
125
126    ss = ShareSide
127         { ssLShareIndex  = li
128         , ssRShareIndex  = ri
129         , ssDisjoint     = null li
130         , ssLSideNames   = lside  left
131         , ssLShareNames  = lshare left
132         , ssRShareNames  = rshare right
133         , ssRSideNames   = rside  right
134         , ssLSide        = lside
135         , ssLShare       = lshare
136         , ssRShare       = rshare
137         , ssRSide        = rside
138         , ssRSplit       = rsplit
139         , ssRAssoc       = rassoc
140         , ssRForward     = rfor
141         , ssRBackward    = rback
142         }
143
